data.message: here again for the daily report...writing here for the 20th time ,after several more in this account..please i need someones help..ive been hacked by a scam ,32 days!!!! now,and seems noone cares..my profile is Nick Pavlidis(you can ask me for my email),and he turned my profile into a public page,wich i even cannot logg in..is there anypne who can help me?its an 8 years profile,and i dont want to make a new..i want it back as it was..friends ,games progress etc.. im gonna keep writing every day if needs..(im using my sons profile for this)..cya tomorrow..im also messaging here,cause i have no other way to finally contact to someone

replies.message: Hi Nick. If you can't get into your account because it was taken over by someone else, please visit the Hacked Accounts section in the Help Center here: http://bit.ly/29htfZb. -Kevin

i ve already did this several times..nothing happens..still the same message when i try to logg in..its the 33rd day with no acces..i think i cant do any more..now its up to you..take my  profile from this scum,and give it back to me..it has become rediculus .. it is a long time dont you think?
Facebook im sorry to say,but im gonna still doing this till my problem solved..every day posts everywhere..
and how im i suppose to logg in to report that my profile is been hacked,and used by someone else?

Facebook i did it one more time,and look what it shown..(once more)  your acccount is turning into  a page real soon..check your email for more details etc etc..and i ve set an administrator(this profile here,my sons) as they asked me..

here again for the daily report...writing here for the 22nd time ,after several more in this account..please i need someones help..ive been hacked by a scam ,34 days!!!! now,and seems noone cares..my profile is Nick Pavlidis(you can ask me for my email),and he turned my profile into a public page,wich i even cannot logg in..is there anypne who can help me?its an 8 years profile,and i dont want to make a new..i want it back as it was..friends ,games progress etc.. im gonna keep writing every day if needs..(im using my sons profile for this)..cya tomorrow..im also messaging here,cause i have no other way to finally contact to someone
Hi there. Will you please send us a private message with more information so we can better assist you? Thanks. -Rey
Facebook i m doing this(message )every day for 23 days..check inbox..send one before 15 mins too
Facebook please answer your inbox..and it seems to be final ,a solution to my problem..but no response again.. :(

writing here for the 23nd time ,after several more in this account..please i need someones help..ive been hacked by a scam ,36 days!!!! now,and seems noone cares..my profile is Nick Pavlidis(you can ask me for my email),and he turned my profile into a public page,wich i even cannot logg in..is there anypne who can help me?its an 8 years profile,and i dont want to make a new..i want it back as it was..friends ,games progress etc.. im gonna keep writing every day if needs..(im using my sons profile for this)..cya tomorrow..im also messaging here,cause i have no other way to finally contact to someone
we lost contact ,when we were on a good way..please contact me again,and wait fir my answer..as you may know,this is my sons account,and cant be logged all time..HELP ME PLEASE!!!

What is your problem?
Can i help u?
If u want to tell me,come to my chatbox

From
MayBell Twin
MayBell Twin  how can you help me?only developers can..but even them seems not..2 months without my account..and keep counting..
Facebook you know what i finally think?that you cant fix it.. admit it..it cant be normal,after 65 days , and you cant give me back my account.. this is rediculus..totaly

Facebook  what on earth is going to happen there guys?are you kidding me?im off since 1st of june..2 months plus without acces?are you all on vacation or some?is there anyone that going to help me?or not..just tell me!!!!
